trans-unit.source: An instance of StateChangedEventArgs is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: StateChangedEventArgs 的執行個體時，會建立<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>物件引發<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>事件。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To obtain the values for the new and the previous <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>, access the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState> properties in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得新的值和先前<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>，存取<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState>事件處理常式中的屬性。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> before the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged"></xref> event.
The PreviousState property represents the synthesizer state with a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: PreviousState 屬性表示的合成器狀態的成員<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>列舉型別。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>

trans-unit.source: Returns the state of the synthesizer before the state changed.
trans-unit.target: 之前的狀態變更，則傳回合成器的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> before the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged"></xref> event.
The State property represents the synthesizer state with a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: State 屬性表示的合成器狀態的成員<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>列舉型別。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>

trans-unit.source: The state of the synthesizer after the state changed.
trans-unit.target: 合成器的狀態變更後的狀態。
